
## Mass In Cumulative

```{r mass-in-cum, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
mic1 = read_mic(file1, type1, grain.classes, grain.rows)
mic2 = read_mic(file2, type2, grain.classes, grain.rows)
mic.diff = diff_mic(mic1, mic2)
mic.rmse.time = rmse_mic(mic.diff, "Time")

mic.diff %>%
  mutate(Station = as.numeric(str_extract(Station, "[0-9]+"))) %>%
  ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_mic, color = GrainClass) + geom_line() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Mass In Cumulative Differences at Stations") +
  facet_wrap( ~ Time)
mic.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = diff_mic, fill = GrainClass) +
  geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap( ~ GrainClass) +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Mass In Cumulative Differences")
mic.rmse.time %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = GrainClass, y = rmse_mic, fill = GrainClass) +
  geom_col(color = "black") + ylab("RMSE") +
  facet_wrap( ~ factor(Time, levels = rev(sort(unique(Time))))) + 
  ggtitle("Mass In Cumulative RMSE by Grain Class")
```
